Html:
Help! I am get the following error when creating a management agent in the Synchronization Manager.
Unable to retrieve configuration parameters from the extension: Value does not fall within the expected range.
The Generic REST MA setup.exe is the Apr 12, 2015 release.
I've
  • verified the 3 files were installed and have the same permissions as other MA's.
  • re-downloaded setup.exe. uninstalled and re-installed.
  • Installed on another FIM server.
Any suggestions on what to try next.

This MA need ECMA 2.3 included in FIM build 4.1.3559.0 and later.

Kindly check your FIM build version and apply the Hotfix. Also, while applying the Hotfix please apply the hotfix in both FIM Service & FIM Sync server.

Regards,
Anurag
